item.description:
Come join us by the river Seine in Paris...but save the airfare! The Gaslight au Coin in Boston's South End is as close to an authentic Parisian Bistro with accountrements imported from Paris!

Savor a choice of entrees, coffee (or tea), juice and a sweet treat "a la Julia Child"... for $9.95 (tax & gratuity excluded) Please pay your server at the brunch, and tip well; because we are awesome.

We start promptly at 10 and stay 'til 11ish. It's always a fun time and a great way to meet new friends!

Free Parking...yes, you heard me right..FREE!

Check out www.gaslight560.com
item.how_to_find_us: The rowdy crowd of beautiful people...
item.name: Sunday Brunch at the Gaslight
